messages.subject: need some quick links if anyone can help...
messages.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone could direct me to some links regarding two specific things. I am having an online discussion and I would prefer to provide links as
messages.messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone could direct me to some links regarding two specific things. I am having an online discussion and I would prefer to provide links as opposed to writing my *personal* perspective on this one. I know how I feel and what I want to say but I think it would be much more well-received from some experts. The blogger takes things from me a little too personally. I looked on Sandra Dodd's site but didn't see anything specific, although I'm sure it's there.

martyrdom
and controlling play

Here is the blog if you want to read it:
http://mamatrue.com/2010/05/05/play-and-let-play/

Peace,
Kelly




-------------------------------------------------
